Text saved: Graffiti is pictures or writing on walls. Is graffiti art? Or is it a crime? Some people think it is art. But other people think it is a crime.

Vandalism is when someone breaks something that is not theirs. In many countries, graffiti is vandalism. This is because people paint on buildings for everyone. Or they paint on buildings that other people own.

The police stop many street artists. And sometimes, the artists must pay money. People who run the cities are not happy. They say it costs a lot of money to clean the graffiti. They clean it from buildings, buses and trains.
